review: I woke up to a sharp abdominal pain, so I consulted Dr. Sanchaita Shah. After looking into my symptoms she asked me to do certain tests. The results came back clean. Despite that she was insistent that I had gallstones and put me on a strict liquid diet. Coming from a small town the medical facilities are questionable. A week later when things started to feel better I happened to travel to Ahmedabad and ate some regular food. By doing so the pain in my stomach was aggravated and thus she asked me to get another ultrasound. This time the reports were clear as day. I had gallstones along with a collapsed gallbladder and needed surgery immediately. The surgical team was also shocked that I wasn’t in as much pain as expected. It was only due to her constant guidance and care that I survived so many days. She also managed all the communication with the surgical team and kept updated throughout the treatment. Her medical knowledge, bedside manner and diagnosis are par excellence.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the kind words . 🙏😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sanchaita is amazing. She was so patient with me even though I asked her so many questions. **** **** ************* *** gets to the core of the problem. She spoke to my spouse as well and counselled us on how we could best manage my condition. She is so sweet and explains everything in detail. She even shared home remedies from her personal experience, not just medical stuff. I would highly recommend her! She's surely become our family doctor now.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words 🙏😊

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Great experience with the doctor. She is empathetic plus available. She came to the hospital at the time of emergency and i really appreciate that about her! 

She is calm and meticulous with her approach! 10/10 - recommended if you’re asking me
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words 🙂

review: Dr. Sanchaita was like an angel to me when my whole family was down with covid.... She would take my calls even at odd times...Her medication helped me recover in 15days without being hospitalised.she is very soft spoken n motivating. Thank u so much doctor 😊
reply_text: Thank you so much for the kind words 👍😊

review: doctor didn't come for online consultation despite having slot available. either she or her staff needs to manage her calendar accordingly. not a great experience
reply_text:
Hello Mr. Amit Gautam,

I can understand your dissatisfaction. I was hospitalised the very same day , thereby wasn’t able to attend to you. Nonetheless, I apologise for the inconvenience . I hope you have recovered .

review: She listens to arising issue and gives minimal medicines required. She has a very intricate knowledge of medicine and a keen diagnostic acumen. She is extremely attentive with her follow ups and patient care. I would definitely recommend her.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words 🙏😊

review: She a very efficient n calm doctor . Her diagnosis power is excellent. We are highly satisfied with her. As a doctor she listens us properly n satisfied us with all our questions
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words 😊🙏
